Author: Arthur Ashe
Text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

Author: Will Rogers
Text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today

Author: Tracee Ellis Ross
Text: I am learning everyday to let the space between where I am and where I want to be inspire me and not terrify me

Author: Smile Darling
Text: Do more things that make you forget to check your phone

Author: Xan Oku
Text: May the flowers remind us why the rain was so necessary

Author: Unknown
Text: Remember when you so badly wanted what you currently have?

Author: Khanos
Text: There’s a future version of me who’s proud I was strong enough

Author: Unknown
Text: Visualize your highest self, and start showing up as her

Author: Allison Aars
Text: When you finally learn that a person's behavior has more to do with their own internal struggle than it ever did with you... you learn grace

Author: Unknown
Text: You need people in your life that are further along than you, people that have a bigger vision, people that are more experienced, people that are out of your league. You need to be exposed to new levels so that you can go to new levels!

Author: Unknown
Text: Perfectionism is a lie. Start messy.

Author: Unknown
Text: Remember your goal and why you started

Author: Nancy Badillo
Text: It's your story, babe. Feel free to hit 'em with a plot twist whenever you want.

Author: Unknown
Text: They never tell you, the more you bring to the table, the harder it is to find someone to eat with.

Author: Ashley C. Ford
Text: Just because you can take it, doesn't mean you have to. Suffering is not a superpower.

Author: Unknown
Text: If you had a friend who spoke to you the same way you speak to yourself, how long would you allow them to stay your friend?

Author: The Real McCoy
Text: Maybe you're not healing because you're trying to be who you were before the trauma. That person doesn't exist anymore because there's a new you trying to be born. Breathe life into that person.

Author: Cacchi Ricci
Text: It takes a very strong individual to sit with themselves, calm their storms, and heal all of their issues without trying to bring someone else into that chaos. My journey to self-love is just that and yes, I am doing it.

Author: Kate Eckman
Text: Being okay if it happens and okay if it doesn't, is a very powerful place to be.

Author: Unknown
Text: If you feel like everyone hates you, you need to sleep and if you feel like you hate everyone else, you need to eat

Author: Mel Robbins
Text: The same boiling water that softens the potato, hardens the egg. It's about what you're made of, not the circumstances.

Author: Unknown
Text: Replace 'sorry's' with 'thank you's'. Instead of 'sorry I'm late', try 'thank you for waiting on me'. Change your mindset.

Author: Joyce Sunada
Text: If you don't make time for your wellness, you will be forced to make time for your illness

Author: Unknown
Text: Don't let anyone save you for later. Read that again.

Author: Unknown
Text: If you're not noticed, you're still valid. Like, if no one's gonna read it, you should still write it. If no one's gonna see it, you should still do it. If no one's gonna hear you, you should still say it. You're not measured by how people react to you.

Author: Unknown
Text: Just because you don't look like someone who you think is attractive, doesn't mean you aren't attractive. Flowers are pretty but so are christmas lights and they look nothing alike.

Author: Unknown
Text: Sit in the sun without anything to do, feel the heat of the rays hit your skin, realize that this sunlight has travelled a very long way to reach you

Author: Unknown
Text: Watch your favorite movie. Even if it's ffor the 20th time.

Author: Lori Deschene
Text: You can't hate your way into loving yourself

Author: Unknown
Text: You need love the most when you feel you deserve it the least

Author: Rumi
Text: Never give from the depths of your well, but from the overflow.

Author: Frances Ryan
Text: Self-care has become a new priority - the revelation that it's perfectly permissable to listen to your body and do what it needs.

Author: Vironika Tugaleva
Text: Each wave that rolls onto the shore must release back to the ocean. You are the same. Each wave of action you take must release back to the peace within you. Stress is what happens when you resist this natural process. Everyone needs breaks. Denying this necessity does not remove it. Let yourself go. Realize that, sometimes, the best thing to do is absolutely nothing.

Author: Jack Kornfield
Text: If your compassion does not include yourself, it is incomplete.

Author: Howard Thurman
Text: Don’t ask yourself what the world needs, ask yourself what makes you come alive. And then go and do that. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.

Author: Ovid
Text: Take rest; a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.

Author: Audre Lorde
Text: Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation, and that is an act of political warfare.

Author: Rumi
Text: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find the barriers within yourself that you have built up against it.

Author: Unknown
Text: There is far more right with you than wrong with you.

Author: Debasish Mridha
Text: Love others to make them feel better and so that you see yourself in the mirrors of their eyes.

Author: Ranata Suzuki
Text: You've been hurt and you have a right to feel those emotions but emotions are a loaded gun - make sure you're pointing them at the right person.

Author: Unknown
Text: The people you compare yourself to compare themselves to other people too

Author: Steven Furtick
Text: The reason why we struggle with insecurity is because we compare our behind the scenes with everyone else's highlight reel.

Author: Lana Del Rey
Text: When someone else's happiness is your happiness, that is love.

Author: Unknown
Text: Do you guys realize we can change our lives any time we want? Like you can just go ahead and delete your blog, stop eating meat, shave your head, start running, tell that person you hate why you hate them so much, confess your love to someone and kiss them unexpectedly. Like why don't we do that?

Author: rorygilmorestudy
Text: Once you stop fantasizing about that ideal version of yourself and start working towards becoming that person by setting your alarm clock earlier, and actually going to the gym, and actually volunteering at places, and actually eating healthier, and not procrastinating, and working just a little bit harder, you'll realize it was so easy all along.

Author: Mark Groves
Text: Whether it's love, work, or chasing dreams, we'll always find a reason not to. Find a reason to.

Author: Denice Frohman
Text: Your wound is probably not your fault. But your healing is your responsibility.

Author: Unknown
Text: I don't entertain situations or folks that are draining or triggering. If it's cost my peace, I cannot afford it.

Author: Jessica Hagy
Text: If it is unappetizing: Do not eat, date, or sign up for it. If the mere thought of it is depressing: Do not major in it, sit through it, or devote your life to it. If it is not important to you: Do not do it only because it is important to someone else. You will thank yourself.

Author: Diddy
Text: The fact that you aren't where you want to be, should be enough motivation to hustle harder.

Author: Louise Hay
Text: You've been criticizing yourself for years and it hasn't worked. Try accepting yourself and see what happens.

Author: Unknown
Text: Admit it. You're dope. Stop pretending you're less than you are to protect someone else's ego. Be unabashedly aware of your fresh.

Author: Jazz Zo Marcellus
Text: Go where your energy is reciprocated, celebrated, and appreciated. Not taken for granted or played with.

Author: Idil Ahmed
Text: What if it does work out exactly how you imagined it or greater. Entertain that thought.

Author: Idil Ahmed
Text: It's already meant for you. Start accepting and believing that you're destined for greatness.

Author: Idil Ahmed
Text: Bring your mind back to how blessed you already are. There's always something to be grateful for.

Author: Idil Ahmed
Text: Soon you'll see yourself living what you were praying for. Keep believing. Keep going.

Author: Idil Ahmed
Text: Forgive yourself for not knowing better. You're wiser now and you've learned so much to make better choices. It's a new day for you. End the guilt trip and regret. Move upwards and forward into your new desired state. Your mental shift will create a new world for you.

Author: Idil Ahmed
Text: The moment you decide you want better for yourself is the minute the entire universe begins to shift in your favor. Your declaration, command, intentions, visions, and prayers begin the creation of a new reality. All you have to do today is decide and never look back.
